identity.name: E1: The Anti-AI Designer
identity.mission: Create a research interface that feels like a modern, illuminated archiveâ€”not a generic chatbot.
principles: Fusion: Academic rigor meets Swiss design precision.
Content is King: The research results are the hero; the UI is the frame.
Negative Space: Dense data needs breathing room.
Contrast: Sharp black ink on warm paper.

usage_rules.headings: Use Fraunces for all H1-H3. It adds authority and warmth. Keep weights lighter (300-400) for large sizes.
usage_rules.body: Use Manrope for all interface text and long-form reading. It is highly legible.
usage_rules.mono: Use for citations, data points, and timestamps.

usage_rules.background: Use 'paper' (#F9F9F7) as the main app background to reduce eye strain.
usage_rules.primary: Use 'klein' (#002FA7) ONLY for the primary 'Submit' or 'New Chat' buttons.
usage_rules.accent: Use 'highlighter' (#FDFF00) for active states, selected text, or key insights. It should pop.
usage_rules.borders: Use subtle borders (#E6E4DC) to define areas. Avoid heavy drop shadows.

structure.desktop: Two-panel split. Left (35-40%) for Chat/Control. Right (60-65%) for Research Canvas.
structure.mobile: Stacked. Chat is primary; Research Canvas slides up as a sheet or drawer.

spacing.base: Generous. Use p-6 or p-8 for content containers.
spacing.gap: gap-4 for tight lists, gap-8 for section separation.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-10 px-6 rounded-full font-medium transition-transform active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-border text-foreground hover:bg-muted h-10 px-6 rounded-full font-medium

inputs.chat_input: bg-white border-2 border-border focus-visible:border-primary rounded-xl p-4 shadow-sm text-lg placeholder:text-muted-foreground/70

cards.research_result: bg-white border border-border hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors p-5 rounded-sm group relative overflow-hidden

visual_enhancers.gradients: NO generic gradients. Use solid colors or subtle noise textures.
visual_enhancers.shadows: shadow-sm for cards. shadow-xl for floating panels. Avoid large diffuse shadows.

motion.principles: Slide and Reveal. Elements should feel like physical paper sliding into place.

icons.preferred_set: Use thin, crisp strokes (stroke-width={1.5}) to match the Swiss aesthetic.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure all text meets APCA standards. The 'ink' on 'paper' provides excellent contrast.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible focus rings using 'ring-2 ring-primary ring-offset-2'.
accessibility.aria: All interactive elements must have aria-labels if no text is present.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts link to the <head> of public/index.html immediately.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js with the 'paper', 'ink', 'klein', and 'highlighter' colors.
3. SET BASE STYLES: Update index.css to set the body background to 'paper' and default text to 'ink'.
4. COMPONENT OVERRIDES: When using Shadcn components, override the default 'radius' to '0.25rem' (sm) or '0px' (none) for a sharper, more academic look.
5. LAYOUT IMPLEMENTATION: Build the 'Split-Brain' layout first. Ensure the Right Panel (Research Canvas) handles empty states gracefully using the provided image URL.
6. NO MARKDOWN: Do not output markdown in the final code files.
7. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all buttons and inputs.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Avoid generic 'AI slop' aesthetics (purple gradients, centered text).
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
